title: Endpoint Resource
description:
Endpoint Resource details: a read, subscribe or write property must be defined.
Docs: https://docs.cybus.io/documentation/services/service-commissioning-files/structure-of-service-commissioning-files/resources/cybus-endpoint#subscribe-read-write

protocol.description: Identifies the protocol for which a connection should be established

agentName.description: Obsolete - this value is no longer being used. The agentName of the referenced connection is used always.

connection.title: Physical address of an existing connection resource
connection.description: refrence a connection resource or type your conntion hostName

qos.description: Quality of service for mqtt messages

retain.description: Whether the last message should be retained (last-value-cached) on the internal broker

targetState.title: The targeted state for this connection

read.title: Read details
read.description: Read details; you may only provide one of read, subscribe or write per endpoint. Docs: https://docs.cybus.io/documentation/services/service-commissioning-files/structure-of-service-commissioning-files/resources/cybus-endpoint#subscribe-read-write

inputBuffering.title: Input buffering properties
inputBuffering.description: Properties to define the behaviour of the input buffering

enabled.title: Enable Buffering
enabled.description: Whether input buffering should be enabled or not

maxConcurrentMessages.title: Maximum concurrent messages
maxConcurrentMessages.description: Maximum number of concurrently processed messages as long as the input buffer queue is non-empty.

maxInputBufferSize.title: Maximum input buffer size
maxInputBufferSize.description: Maximum number of input messages that are queued in the input buffer. Exceeding messages will be discarded. Adjust this to a higher value if you are handling bursty traffic.

waitingTimeOnEmptyQueue.title: Waiting time during empty queue
waitingTimeOnEmptyQueue.description: Waiting time in milliseconds after the input buffer queue ran empty and before checking again for newly queued input messages. Regardless of this value, on non-empty input buffer queue all messages will be processed without waiting time in between until the queue is empty again.

rules.title: Rules to be applied to the endpoint

topic.title: Custom topic this endpoint should use

inputBuffering.title: Input buffering properties
inputBuffering.description: Properties to define the behaviour of the input buffering

enabled.title: Enable Buffering
enabled.description: Whether input buffering should be enabled or not

maxConcurrentMessages.title: Maximum concurrent messages
maxConcurrentMessages.description: Maximum number of concurrently processed messages as long as the input buffer queue is non-empty.

maxInputBufferSize.title: Maximum input buffer size
maxInputBufferSize.description: Maximum number of input messages that are queued in the input buffer. Exceeding messages will be discarded. Adjust this to a higher value if you are handling bursty traffic.

waitingTimeOnEmptyQueue.title: Waiting time during empty queue
waitingTimeOnEmptyQueue.description: Waiting time in milliseconds after the input buffer queue ran empty and before checking again for newly queued input messages. Regardless of this value, on non-empty input buffer queue all messages will be processed without waiting time in between until the queue is empty again.

rules.title: Rules to be applied to the endpoint

topic.title: Custom topic this endpoint should use

errorMessage.required: One of read, subscribe or write must be provided
errorMessage.oneOf: Exactly one of read, subscribe or write must be provided
